name: WF World For Warframe
description:
(Support 3D Touch、Widget and notification of event push)

- Events -
[Alert] Synchronize the warframe alert event to see the mission location, type, countdown, reward, picture, and item description
[Invasion] Synchronize warframe Invasion events to see the mission location, type, countdown, hostility, conflict progress, reward items and pictures.
[Void Fissures] Synchronizing warframe void fissures events to see the mission location, type and countdown of different crack grades
[Sortie] Synchronize the warframe sorties to see the BOSS, countdown, task location, type, abnormal state
[Ostrons] Synchronous Cetus reward task, see each stage of reputation, task reward and rarity
[Conclave] Synchronizing the warframe conclave to see the challenge of the conclave for a certain period of time
[Special Event / Activity] Synchronous warframe special events / activities, such as Ghoul Purge, and so on.


- Dynamic -
[Cetus Time and Earth Time] There are Cetus Time, Earth Time, and the time needed to reach the next stage
[Void Trader]Look at Void Trader’s journey, and his goods
[News]News, activities, updates, hot repairs and so on at the warframe official network
[Darvo Deals] Synchronizing the warframe daily commodity promotion information
[Store] Show warframe store's latest items


- Search - (with a mini Encyclopedia)
[Drops] Search for drop objects, probability, and rarity (with precise search: common blueprint drop, planet node drop, MOD drop, Plains of Eidolon fishing data)
[Riven Calculator] Query the effect of the riven mod on the different weapons.
[search price] search price of goods and components, sales price trend in a week, ratio of purchase and demand, current price / required player status: including game nickname, online situation and personal price.
[Search Relic Rewards] Search relic reward items, rarity and probability
[ZAW Builder] Customize your strongest ZAW weapon, name and store it!
[Amp Builder] Analog collocation components:Prism, Scaffold, Brace, and it can be gilded

- Database -
[Database] the current database holds the summary information of [Warframes], [Weapons], [MOD], [Archwing], [Compaions], [Arcanes], [Focus], [Equipments], [Rank Test], and [Mission Description]
[Table Made] Contains form made of Components - Relic, Warframe - Syndicate MOD
[Music] Database built some favorite game music (you know >_<)
[Game] Contains a puzzle and a flying game, and it can set the level of difficulty.

- setting -
[Theme] 6 themes of blue, green, yellow, red, red, purple and black are applied to the whole APP, and you can switch daytime / night mode
[Language] switching between Chinese and English and applied to the whole APP
[Platform] switching between three platforms of PC, PS4 and XBOX1

- the future -
We're trying to do something good，Tenno（#funny）

Application data for PC, PS4, XBOX1 content
